message: All metadata fields for the indicator 3-d-1, translated into en
data: Goal 3. Ensure healthy lives and promote well-being for all at all ages3.d Strengthen the means available to all countries, in particular developing countries, for early warning, risk reduction and management of national and global health risks3.d.1.Application of international health regulations (IHR) and preparation for health emergenciesAffirmation of the application of the International Health RegulationsAffirmation of the application of the International Health RegulationsNot available
